topic.title: The Mechanics of Reuse in DITA

body.p: DITA offers several robust technologies designed to support content reuse.

section.title: Maps: reusing one map in multiple other maps with content filters
Maps: reusing one topic in multiple contexts with multiple content filters
Topicsets: reusing named collections of map references to topics
Content libraries: reusing named blocks of content from topics
Direct content referencing (conrefs): URI-based reuse of referenced content (library elements, topics, or maps)
Indirect content referencing (keyrefs): Key-based reuse of referenced content (library elements, topics, or maps)
